General.Name: Bigbloc Construction Limited
General.Description: Bigbloc Construction Limited manufactures, sells, and markets aerated autoclave concrete (AAC) blocks in India. The company offers building blocks and AAC bricks. It markets its AAC blocks under the NXTBLOC brand name. The company also exports its products. Bigbloc Construction Limited was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Surat, India.
General.Address: A/601-B, International Trade Centre, Surat, India, 395002
